introduction.text: The MIDRC BDF Imaging Hub (BIH) is a data hub, which is a federated data search, discovery, and analysis platform that allows researchers to query and analyze data from independent data repositories or resources related to medical imaging.

buttons.name: Analyze Data
buttons.body: Analyze your selected cases using Jupyter Notebooks in our secure cloud environment
buttons.label: Run analysis

items.name: Discovery
items.tooltip: Use free-text search and tags to rapidly find relevant studies, discover new datasets across multiple resources, and easily export selected data files to the analysis workspace.

items.name: Workspace
items.tooltip: Gen3 workspaces are secure data analysis environments in the cloud that can access data from one or more data resources.

items.name: Example Analysis
items.tooltip: Learn how to use Jupyter Notebooks to explore and visualize data discovered in the Biomedical Research Hub by running a static tutorial notebook, or use one of these examples as a launching point for your own custom analysis.

login.title: MIDRC BDF Imaging Hub (BIH)
login.subTitle: Discover, Analyze, and Share Data
login.text: The MIDRC BDF Imaging Hub (BIH) is a data hub, which is a federated data search, discovery, and analysis platform that allows researchers to query and analyze data from independent data repositories or resources related to medical imaging.
login.contact: If you have any questions about access or the registration process, please contact
